SEARCH
Module FoundationsF25_2
Package entityClasses

Class Request

java.lang.Object
entityClasses.Request
public class Request extends Object

Title: Request Class

Description: Represents a request submitted by a user within the educational platform. Each Request contains a title, content, the username of the requester, a unique identifier, and a status indicating whether the request has been checked or processed.

Responsibilities:

  • Stores request details including title, content, and requester
  • Tracks whether the request has been reviewed or processed
  • Provides getters and setters for all fields to support database operations

Note: Validation, permission checking, and request processing logic should be handled by higher-level services or controllers.

Since:
2024-01-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Educational Platform Development Team

      c - the content of the request
      r - the username of the requester
